mapper.select: SELECT A.DEVICESEQ as deviceSeq, D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYINTERVAL as busStopDetailCategoryInterval, D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYINTERVALDISTANCE as busStopDetailCategoryIntervalDistance FROM DEVICE A INNER JOIN DEVICE_BUS B ON A.DEVICESEQ = B.DEVICESEQ INNER JOIN BUS_INFO C ON B.BUSINFOSEQ = C.BUSINFOSEQ LEFT JOIN BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY D ON C.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ WHERE A.DEVICEMODEL=#{deviceId} AND B.DEVICEBUSSTAT = 'show'
SELECT DEVICEMODEL AS deviceModel FROM DEVICE WHERE DEVICESEQ =#{deviceSeq};

SELECT E.VIRTUALBUSSTOPSEQ as virtualBusStopSeq,E.VIRTUALBUSSTOP as virtualBusStop,E.VIRTUALBUSSTOPLATITUDE AS virtualBusStopLatitude,E.VIRTUALBUSSTOPLONGITUDE AS virtualBusStopLongitude,E.VIRTUALBUSSTOPORDER AS virtualBusStopOrder FROM DEVICE A INNER JOIN DEVICE_BUS B ON A.DEVICESEQ = B.DEVICESEQ INNER JOIN BUS_INFO C ON B.BUSINFOSEQ = C.BUSINFOSEQ INNER JOIN BUSSTOP_DETAIL_CATEGORY D ON C.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ INNER JOIN VIRTUAL_BUSSTOP E ON D.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ = E.BUSSTOPDETAILCATEGORYSEQ WHERE A.DEVICEMODEL=#{deviceId} AND B.DEVICEBUSSTAT = 'show' ORDER BY virtualBusStopOrder ASC;
mapper.update: UPDATE LOCATION SET BUSSTOPSEQ=#{busStopSeq} WHERE LOCATIONSEQ=#{locationSeq};
mapper.select: SELECT B.BUSSTOPORDER AS busStopOrder,A.BUSSTOPSEQ AS busStopSeq FROM LOCATION A INNER JOIN BUSSTOP B ON A.BUSSTOPSEQ = B.BUSSTOPSEQ WHERE LOCATIONTIME = (SELECT MAX(LOCATIONTIME) FROM LOCATION WHERE DEVICESEQ = #{deviceSeq} AND BUSSTOPSEQ IS NOT NULL);
